thread.title: GFA to organize FIFA Physical fitness course for National, Premier League Club coaches
thread.title_full: GFA to organize FIFA Physical fitness course for National, Premier League Club coaches

title: GFA to organize FIFA Physical fitness course for National, Premier League Club coaches
text:
18:42 CET GFA to organize FIFA Physical fitness course for National, Premier League Club coaches By Ghana FA 
The Ghana Football Association has requested that each Premier League Club must nominate a Coach for the upcoming FIFA Physical fitness course which will be held from 15th -20th December, 2015. 
The names of the nominees are to be sent to the Technical Department Directorate of the GFA latest by 19th October, 2015. 
National team and University coaches are also expected to take part in the course. Sports News Follow Us Most of the people who point accusing fingers are as guilty as the people they accuse. By: akoaso
